headline: Live Nation (LYV) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Profit Growth Narrative Despite $412.7M One-Off Loss
summary: Live Nation Entertainment (LYV) delivered another period of earnings momentum as net profit margins rose to 2.3% from 1.1% a year earlier, showing a clear improvement in profitability. The company has averaged robust earnings growth of 79.8% annually over the past five years and recorded an even stronger 107.7% jump in the latest year. With revenue expected to climb 7.6% per year (lagging the US market’s 10.5% rate), but earnings forecast to surge 41.6% versus the market’s 16%, investors are...

headline: Live Nation price target lowered to $172 from $180 at JPMorgan
summary: JPMorgan lowered the firm’s price target on Live Nation (LYV) to $172 from $180 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares following the fiscal Q2 report. The firm believes the impact from secondary ticketing changes is less than what was priced into the shares. Live Nation’s demand indicators remain strong, with continued growth in onsite spending and event deferred revenue up 37%, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Live Nation (LYV) Ends 3-Day Run, Tumbles 10.6% on Profit Fall
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Left Behind Amid Wall Street Cheer. Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE:LYV) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Wednesday.
